content: Which 'Piano Man' released an album in 1973 that has since become one of the best-selling albums in the US?

I believe you're referring to Billy Joel, who is famously known as the "Piano Man." His album "Piano Man," released in 1973, has indeed achieved significant commercial success and is considered one of the best-selling albums in the United States. However, it's worth noting that the album was actually titled "Piano Man" and was released in 1973, but it's his earlier album "Billy Joel" from 1971 that also gained considerable attention. But based on your question, it seems you're specifically asking about the 1973 release.
